!Vice Hierarch Casca: A wind is beginning to blow, one that may strengthen into a storm that will shake the foundations of this world. A Kamael wind... You, Kamael warrior, what do you wish to become? The Kamael have 3 types of skills that have been handed down from ancient times. I will tell you about one of them, the Berserker.
